summary: An Ordinance directing the City Treasurer to accept the principal sum of Two and 50/100 ($2.50) Dollars, plus interest on same at the rate of ten (10%) percent per annum from March 1, 1888, to April 4, 1911, in full settlement for old city taxes for the year 1887, as assessed against Block 11, T. Hanford's Addition to South Seattle, as shown in the old Tremper Rolls on file in City Treasurer's Office.
